title: Episode 103: The Psychology of Humor (w/Dr. Lucy Arendt)
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In our April Fool’s Day themed episode, Georjeanna and Ryan talk with St. Norbert Business Professor and humor expert, Dr. Lucy Arendt, about the psychology of humor.  They tackle big questions like, when is humor healthy? When is it unhealthy? And can a meatball be eaten as a hand fruit?
itunes:subtitle: In our April Fool’s Day themed episode, Georjeann…
description: In our April Fool’s Day themed episode, Georjeanna and Ryan talk with St. Norbert Business Professor and humor expert, Dr. Lucy Arendt, about the psychology of humor.  They tackle big questions like, when is humor healthy? When is it unhealthy? And can a meatball be eaten as a hand fruit?
